content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work on 8/3/15 when i saw helicopters off to my keft, about 6.  a fighter jet flew by on my right, about 20 feet above the trees when it turned left and flew south to the helicopters.   i stopped my car to watch.  i don't know why i did that.  i saw another jet fly towards the helicopters.   about 30 seconds later an object approached from the south where the helicopters were.  it headed north right above my head.  it was rectangular and had 2 large lights on opposite ends in the front.  it flew directly above my head and did not make a sound.  it was dark not giving off light.  it was about a foot above the tallest tree.  it has a tiny lt on thee bottom.  i was shaken.  i've never seen anything like it or a craft move that quietly. it moved north and the trees blocked my view.
content.summary: Driving on why 528.  saw helicopters.  fighter jet following why turned to areas where helicopters were.  silent object came from that area.  it was so quiet i could hear crickets.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work on 8/3/15 when i saw helicopters off to my keft, about 6.  a fighter jet flew by on my right, about 20 feet above the trees when it turned left and flew south to the helicopters.   i stopped my car to watch.  i don't know why i did that.  i saw another jet fly towards the helicopters.   about 30 seconds later an object approached from the south where the helicopters were.  it headed north right above my head.  it was rectangular and had 2 large lights on opposite ends in the front.  it flew directly above my head and did not make a sound.  it was dark not giving off light.  it was about a foot above the tallest tree.  it has a tiny lt on thee bottom.  i was shaken.  i've never seen anything like it or a craft move that quietly. it moved north and the trees blocked my view.
content.summary: Driving on why 528.  saw helicopters.  fighter jet following why turned to areas where helicopters were.  silent object came from that area.  it was so quiet i could hear crickets.

content.detailedDescription: I was putting out the trash,as i always do,look for orions belt.It was clear that night,i found orions belt when it was blocked out something so big it blocked just about the whole sky!We do have a lot of lights now since they have been building so much around here.It was black as black can be,no lights or sound.It came across so fast,as it went it blacken that part of the sky as it went.As i said,blocked out so much of the sky as it went over.If i would guess it might have been going over to howard county to the west.About 2 weeks later,i was just about to fall asleep when this bright and i mean bright light lite the bedroom up as if it was day time!I would say it looked to be raining down light!No sound!No cars going by!No fire trucks!No helilos!It lasted about ten seconds,maybe 15!I told my wife in the morning about the light,she said did you have your earplugs in,no i did not,she snores bad,i told her i was so beat from painting the deck i did not need them!You can have someone call me if you like!
content.summary: It was hugh

content.detailedDescription:
Me encontraba en el jardin trasero de casa de mis padres junto a la piscina en dos tumbonas hablando con un amigo, la hora era las 12,40 aproximadamente, principios de agosto de 1992. en un momento de la conversacion en la que nos estabamos mirando hubo un flash potentisimo,  de luz muy blanca que ilumino todo lo que me rodeaba dandole al contorno de las cosas matices azulados, como el flash de una camara de fotos pero muchisimo mas potente y de luz mas blanca, esa luz vino de encima de nosotros y al mirar hacia arriba vimos una estrella fugaz que se dirigia al oeste y tres luces que formaban un triangulo equilatero.

las luces de ese triangulo equilatero eran de color anaranjado, de luz fija, muy visibles pero sin ser brillantes y muy grandes con respecto a las de un avion de pasajeros.

si las comparo, diria que las luces de un avion de pasajeros son como una pelota de ping pong y las 3 luces serian como las de una pelota de baloncesto. la altura a la que a mi me dio la impresion que estaba, es la de un avion de pasajeros y su velocidad era lenta, algomas lenta que cuando vemos pasar un avion a gran altura.
iba en linea recta y deje de verlo cuando el cipres de la casa vecian me tapo la vision , me levante rapidamente e intemte seguir viendolo pero los arboles no me dejaron ver y para cuando corri a la parte delantera de casa de mis padres habia desaparecido.

intente asegurarme de lo que habia visto y de que no me estaba equivocando y me fije en las ventanas de la casa de los vecinos que estaban cerradas por si el fogonazo podia ser una camara, pero no habia nadie y nunca habia visto un flash tan potente, no habia nadie ni se oia nada.

mi amigo se quedo sorprendido, pero cuando lo conte al resto de mis amigos el no dijo nada , no lo nego pero no ha querido volver a hablar de lo ocurrido.

esto ocurrio en una parte de la ciudad un tanto apartada, pero muy cercana y esa luz tuvo que verla alguien mas , a no ser que iluminase solo las parcelas mia y de mi vecino.

escribo esto porque en uno de vuestros programas de television se decribio un objeto con las mismas caracteristicas al que vi y quisiera saber si he tenido algun error de percepcion o tiene alguna explicacion logica.
content.summary: Flash de luz que ilumina todo lo que me rodea, con luz blanca azulada y en el cielo 3 luces fijas anaranjadas en triangulo aquilatero

content.detailedDescription:
Over 25 strange ships flew over us while camping. we could feel them come since they were small lights at the horizon, then seemed as it came closer to us. so close that we thaught it was a drone someone was controlling (it seemed to be around 30 meters from us). when we got a better view of it, we noticed some lights flashing around it, and then started to think it was an airplane. 
right when it was over us, we felt a presence, something strange that made us still. it went away and we started to joke about it, but i felt something more was about to happen. then we turned and saw some more approaching, they all seemed to be heading behing a mountain about 5 miles away from us.

we were very thrilled at first, until it started feeling heavier; temperature dropped, we felt heavier and were scared, couldnt move much. thats when we decided to go back to the fire and later on, try to sleep. but the thing is; we couldnt get any sleep, we could feel something in the air. ships were still flying above us and made a loud noise (kind of a jet-like sound but not so constant, it changed to modify its speed and height)

we spent about an hour trying to sleep, but ended waiting for the morning to come. time seemed to have stopped a couple hours, but at last, sounds of nature came back, so did the light and the sense of tranquility
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Over 25 transparent-kind lighting ufo's

content.detailedDescription: Woke up at around three a.M. looked out the bedroom window and saw a light moving behind the trees,as it cleared the trees that where blocking the view it was a triangle object that had a bright white light at each corner on the underside and one red light in the center underside.Object moved in a straight line from north to south at 300' to 500' high, at a slow speed, slower than the private planes that i see flying.Watched it for 15 to 20 seconds until more trees blocked my view.
content.summary: Triangle shaped object traveling from north to south.White and red lights

content.detailedDescription:
This event occurred many years ago and i still can't get it off my mind.  i remember it very vividly even after all these years. i was getting ready with my mother & grandmother to go to the neighboring town to look for a dress for the upcoming homecoming dance.  when we left our home we noticed a very bright light (star, we thought) in the eastern sky.  it was early evening.. maybe an hour  to 1.5 hrs of daylight left.  as we drove further into the countryside, we were aware that this "star" was getting closer and closer.  there were no other vehicles in our area and my mother pulled over to the side of the road to get a better look at this object, because by now, we knew it was certainly no "star".  it  flew over our car very low and very slow.  as it approached, my mother wanted to get out and see it,but i was so scared and pleaded with her not to get out so she did not.  we had rolled down the windows to look at it and i did not hear any sound whatsoever... it was perfectly silent, not even a hum and i knew that there was no way it could be an airplane.  it was the "typical" flying saucer shape.. rounded with a domed top.  the car did not shut off or anything like that... it just flew over us. after it passed over, it picked up speed very quickly and zoomed straight up until it, once again, looked just like another star. 

i have since then been involved in aviation for the past 40 years and have yet to see any kind of experimental, military, or civilian aircraft.  i recall this so intently and thought i would share my story with you folks.
content.summary: Witnessed bright star-like light miles away, then lowered over car as it neared , then sped off  high & very fast

content.detailedDescription: Hi, i was taking pictures of the cloud formations that evening, they were very colorful.  i didn't see the bright disc objects until a few weeks later when i was erasing pictures from my phone at my leisure and noticed a very bright spot on a picture, thought maybe it was a crack on the lens, until i expanded the picture....Wow.  so then i found two other pictures taken within seconds of each other.
content.summary: Please see pictures attached

content.detailedDescription:
Immer wiederkehrende flugobjekte, kommen in unregelmäßigen abständen.
4-6 stück in der anzahl. blau-weiss blinkende objekte( kugeln) die erst in einer reihe(formation) auftreten, sich dann teilen und jedes objekt keinen erkennbaren kurs folgt. extrem schnelle und ungewöhnliche flugbewegungen die angst einjagend sind. sie schweben lange bewegungslos über den häusern, nähern sich bis auf 100m über den häusern, und bleiben zwischen 5min. und 2 stunden über den häusern. und verschwinden dann blitzartig wie sie erschienen sind. diese objekte haben sehr viele menschen schon gesichtet! sie kommen seit ca. 1 jahr immer wieder und so wie es aussieht, untersuchen sie hier die gegend und die menschen.
content.summary: Immer wiederkehrende flugobjekte 4-6 stück, schweben, keinen erkennbaren kurs

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed a bright light directly above us. it then started to travel ne. there was a plane near it and the differences were startling. the plane had the normal blinking lights while this object had only a bright white light. we could see it for about 15 minutes and even after it moved very far away we could still see the light add if it was still pointed towards us. i have seen many airplanes with landing lights and this was different. also planes do not travel with landing lights at altitude.
content.summary: White light seen moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I did not see this .But i was looking at the videos that are captured since i installed a new ring doorbell on my front door.  i know there was lightning a bit last night but i thought this was odd becase it shows this ball of light ascending rather than decending.  i don't know why it is ascending. if it was decending i would think it was just a shoting star and maybe that is all it is.  you guys figure it out
content.summary: This video came from front door of recent installation of ring doorbell

content.detailedDescription:
53 springfield street nottingham uk...1963...I was 4 years old and in bed sleeping...I was awoken by presence in bedroom...There were 3 small greyish
entities beside bed...They resembled fish men from  "stingray"...Complete with ridges on head and face...I was initially paralysed and could only move eyes...The next thing i remember was flying through room down passageway landing and down stairs...One of them flew with me one was on floor and i dont know where third went... after that i have no memory...This happened multiple times...On waking i would find that my pj top was on inside out and i would have sore eyes and on one occasion my eyes were so heavily encrusted that i awoke screaming that i was blind.. ...They were so bad that mum had to bathe them with warm water for 5 minutes before i could open them...Also i became light and noise sensitive and my behaviour changed, im told i became hypervigilant hyperactive, refused to go to bed and more introverted...I often awoke with nosebleeds..  needless to say i was terrified..

20 grover avenue mapperley nottingham...1972 1200-0400 hrs
bright white light outside bedroom window...Presence in room..Next thing im flying inside bedroom then im flying above street outside..No ufo or alien sighting but the next thing is that i was in a classroom, everything was white, including the "blackboard", the like of which was novel for me...There were other children who were like me there...There were 10-15 of us of mixed ages between approx 6 and 14...We were all taught the same stuff, which seemed strange, but i cant remember what it was...The tutor was not human but i cant remember what... this happened multiple times

steedman avenue mapperley nottingham...Summer 1973 10-!!Pm...Came out of friends house...Without looking i immediately became aware of bright white light in
starry night sky that was looking at me! ...Instead of heading directly home 
i went the other way...The light followed me...After 200m i changed direction
 the light followed me ..I tried this another two times and on each occasion the light changed direction to follow me...I ran home scared

lambley dumbles lambley nottingham 1200hrs approx...Camping in fields with 
2 friends...Lying on back watching stars i noticed huge white light in sky
...Shortly after this a smaller light seemed to come out of larger light orbit it and then disappear behind it.A week later i returned and saw same
about his time i was bought a digital watch...I was unable to wear it 
as every time i did it malfunctioned....Initially we thought it was
faulty but after two replacements it was obvious it was me...I also 
became mildly psychic knowing things eg.. i was in local supermarket
and lady cutting cheese to order...I ordered a pound of cheese and she cut
it exactly to weight...The next thing i know i tell her that she will do this three more times... the next customer ordered a pound and she cut it
exactly...She then said that well see if u are right and cut a further to pieces off the block...They both weighed exactly a pound...My friend was present and very surprised...As i was
about this time i became aware of a piece of metal in the heel of my foot...It was greyish about one fifth size of matchstick...I have no idea how it got there and i would be aware of pain if i had trodden on it...


7 sunset avenue woodford green essex 1984?  1200-0200 approx.. in bed.. awoke paralysed with bright white light outside window, presence in room...The bed size was betwen single and double...I was between sheets...My whole body was moved from one side of bed to the other sliding but without rucking the sheets...I reported this to local ufo group but cant recollect which one...They came and interviewed me...

14 magdala road nottingham 1994...0200-0400..In bed paralysed...Pierced by brilliant white light in forehead...I had series of 3 visions...When i awoke i had the sense that i was not the same person who went to sleep...
visions were of  flooded suburban area, colosseum in rome and woman pouring water onto globe of earth...

as above 1995 0200-0400... in bed paralysed...Suddenly i could see through bedroom wall, living room wall and two other houses to view a house on an adjacent street, someone or thing is calling my name and trying to get me to go there...Neddless to say i didnt...I had same thing but this time it was about going to moss side in manchester...

over the years i have had multiple sleep paralysis incidents...I am unable to recall times and dates...I have also had a lot of psychic experiences that seem to be indirectly related...Also i have been to that classroom on multiple occasions over the years

i believe my health has suffered from contact... i suffer from cluster headaches, fibromyalgia, low thyroid function, anxiety and depression,...
i have been in wheelchair for past 7 years...
content.summary: Taken multiple nights

content.detailedDescription:
A man from ontario posted a photo on facebook.

using photo forensics, i could not detect anything that stood out as a
fake. i've included the photo as an attachment. many people are saying
fake, but that's not what the light layers and image data indicate.

you're the only people i could think of to contact about this,  mufon ontario's website is returning email.
content.summary: Strange photo on facebook not showing evidence of being tampered with

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down the road one evening  dawn, near a horse pasture randomly taking pictures with my samsung s5 as i drove down thecroad. i was not able to actually see this orb until i looked at my pictures i had taken. in my first photo you can see it forming, then the rest are crisp, clear picture in front of black dark cloud. only my cellphone camera could have captured this picture,  i  did not selectively point at it directly as i  was just randomly shooting out my cars window.
i didn't know i'd taken a picture of one, only until i sat down and viewed my pictures i'd taken was when i realized this yellow orb w tiny white lights zig zag around it.
sincerely,  micky malloy
content.summary: Randomly was taking pictures out my cars window, not noticing it until i sat down to view my pictures

content.detailedDescription:
me and my friend were playing outside. we had decided to go to an abandoned warehouse to hangout. when we got to the warehouse, we heard a strange buzzing sound. we looked around the sky for the source of the noise.

 upon which we saw a large, silver, oval craft hovering very slowly going towards the southeast. the craft was omitting some sort of static, ( the static was distorting the air around the craft, making a, "fog" like appearance around it. ) me and my friend watched, awe struck for about 5 minutes as this craft floated slowly out of view. after it was out of our view, we ran back to my house as quickly as possible.

  we were both extremely shaken by what we had seen. we agreed to not tell our parents, because they probably wouldn't have taken us seriously. it has been our secret for nearly a decade.
content.summary: Silver orb floating in sky, making buzzing noise.

content.detailedDescription: I would wake up with blood on my underwear; and not from my bottom where u would expect. the blood was from above my legs around my ovaries area. at first i thought it was just maybe a sore of some sort ..Like a pimple, on both sides, so i didn't really think to much of it but over time i noticed that it kept happening i noticed it maybe on three or four different occasions over a span of maybe 2 years, so maybe around the second or third time i noticed the blood (it wasn't much) i tried to see where it was coming from. im a bit overweight so i pulled back the roll of fat i noticed there was a hole ,,,like a small tubular hole, it wasn't a sore or pimple it was an opening on both sides right above my ovaries area. on another occasion i wouldn't even have noticed it but felt like a little bump there and it was itchy and a scab had formed and when i scratched it off i looked to see if it was the same thing and it was a hole a tubular hole a small opening like the size of a needle opening but it was a tube going in. that's not all, i woke up one morning after my commonlaw husband had gone to work and my body was so sore, and as i lay in bed i had little bits of like pictures of standing in a line with other people and there was a man about my age standing beside me with no clothes on and i noticed that i had no clothes on either. and these small beings maybe 4 feet in height were walking by in front of this line up ,,,,, like checking us out and talking to each other about us, and i don't know why but i jumped out on top of them and tried to beat them ... i guess. anyways i woke up and my body felt like it was in a train wreck. like i had been beaten. but i got up that day and has a hot bath and went for a drive... it was the middle of the afternoon on a sunny day and i found myself pulling in to a midas muffler place of business ...Im not sure why i stopped there but i went in and the guy that was working behind the desk looked like the guy that i remember standing next to me. this was a really weird meeting because he looked at me like he knew me and i said u look familiar and he said that i looked familiar too. and i didn't really know how to say it but i said did something weird happen to u last night,,,, imagine that... total strangers... and he looked at me kinda weird and he was trying to keep busy like he didn't want to know why i was there. and he said yes  ...And we both just kept looking at each other without knowing what to say so i said i can see ur busy can i get ur card and i left. after that i noticed blood on my underwear again and for some reason believe i have kids somewhere...Out there. and because i was so violent with them i may never get to see them. i just wish i could say sorry for attacking them . and i wonder if they did make kids from my ovaries, i would like to get hypnotized because i believe there is more to this that i cant recall or may have blocked,  crazy. i know but i haven't told anyone, but maybe someone has shared a similar recollection. ....It feels good just to be able to share this with someone .Thank u
content.summary: Abduction

content.detailedDescription:
I was 4-5 years old. i was staying at my grandfather's house. i was sleeping in my grandfather's and grandmother's room. i got up at dawn to go watch cartoons (actually watch the test pattern until cartoons came on). when i went out into the main living area of the house, i saw a "being." the entity was dull or matte silver in color. it was standing about 30 feet away. it was about 4 foot tall. i estimated its height because it was standing in front of the refrigerator and was taller than i was in relation to the door of the refrigerator, but not as tall as a full grown person would be. when i saw it, it stood motionless. i could see it was wearing what looked like a suit, but the material did not appear to be cloth and did not wrinkle. it looked kind of like a robot, but without any eyes. anyway, after a very long and uncomfortable pause of us staring at one another, it lifted a hand up in the air. though i did not sense any malice, it's gesture did not make me feel comfortable and i immediately turned and ran back into my grandparent's room and hid between them. i did not leave the room until 3 or 4 hours after they got up. i completely missed all the cartoons that day (which was the only time in my life i ever missed saturday morning cartoons). i did have other odd experiences in that area, but i will file those separately hen i get some time. 

in direct relation to this story, i told no one of this incident until i was in my early 30s. my grandfather was a very no nonsense guy and i figured he'd think i was crazy if i told him i saw aliens in his house. when i finally got up the courage and told him about the incident, he listened very intently without comment. when i was done, he told me of an incident he had in the 1960's, in which he (and two logging crews) watched a 45 foot disk fly silently below them on a logging site for 15 minutes while they ate lunch at camp govey logging camp in the olympic mountains. he mentioned several other people that were present for that sighting, including my childhood baseball coach (jack mulligan of kamiah, id). i must admit, it was a shock to hear him talk so openly about ufos, as he was a devout catholic and aliens and christianity seemed incompatible to his worldviews and opinions. 

anyway, that's my story.
content.summary: Tin woodsman in my grandfather's house

content.detailedDescription: I was with 4 friends in my car, with another friend following us on his motorcycle. everyone in the car as well as our friend on the motorcycle witnessed the 3 lights and a very large dark triangle in the sky right above the tree tops.  we pulled over to observe the object and it slowly turned in the sky and flew away extremely fast, made no noise whatsoever.
content.summary: Large dark triangle, 3 lights,

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and a friend of mine were standing in front of my house (my house faces west) when he spotted a bright white stationary light in the sky maybe 2-3 km away, he pointed it out as it seemed strange to him, saying "what the heck is that" as he pointed to it. i immediately got my phone and started recording as i had seen something strange a few days prior to this incident. the light began moving towards us (moving west to east) the object made no sound, had no tail, and did not flicker. it moved at a very high rate of speed in a straight line, as it went over my house, it appeared to flash a brighter white, and then turned orange and quickly started gaining altitude straight up. it disappeared within 1-2 seconds.

we stood there for a few minutes shocked at what we had seen, we sat on my patio and started discussing what exactly we had witnessed, constantly looking at the sky. after about 15 minutes, another white light turned on in the sky, behind it another, then another and another, they went on in consecutive order from east to west with a 1km spread between each one, each turning on only after the other, a total of 4 objects, stationary in the sky with no sound. the first displayed the same behaviour seen from the one 15 minutes earlier. it moved west to east at a high rate of speed as the others appeared to stay still, it turned from white to orange, then shot up into the sky at an alarming speed gone within 1-2 seconds. the other 3 followed shortly after. 

the objects appeared to be low, i'm not sure exactly how high as i don't know their size, its hard to gauge their distance, i'd say below 2500 feet above 1500. they emitted no sound, and displayed acceleration and altitude climb so extreme it makes the f-22 raptor look like a kids toy.
content.summary: Series of 5 ufos hovering then moving west to east high rate of speed and climbing altitude instantaneously.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been observing the night skies for some years now,after witnessing a few things that where very weird to me at the time is what got me into it.
further i started to be more aware of whats going in are skies from then on and what i discovered is amazing.

i am a trained security guard and been working in loss prevention some years now with great success due to my visual abilities.

cutting the chase,, 
i pretty much i can spot out a ufo in space 
(on any given clear night).

i would stare at the sky and wait until i see movement and lo and behold something appears from nowhere that appears to be a first glance a star in space ,only it starts to move straight and then zig zag thru stars as like to avoid them and as soon as im seeing this it feels like it knows i was watching it and then fades and blinks out in seconds.

at any clear night i can show them to anyone, i also have a very high powered lazer in order to point out these ufo orbs in space to whom i show because most people would not be able to find it without a trained eye.
the ufos don't seem to like the fact i can easily spot them form such a distance using my lazer, its like im exposing them and there fling habits 

i am very surprised no one else has noticed this. 

what are they?
why can i see them any night when i want?

there's not a doubt in my mind on what they are
don't care what people might think, i can prove any of them wrong.
content.summary: Very fast  zig zaging giant orb like

content.detailedDescription: Im not a witness, but i have punture marks on leg in shape of triangle.  also i have a rash i think came from same night i might have called them in.
content.summary: Didn't see it. was asleep.

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting in van in the parking lot of my apt complex looking for my cigarettes. happens to see a brightly lit object from the corner of my eye. i live by an airport and didn't think much of it until i saw the colors of the lights. i thought they were unusual. i stepped out of the van to look at the object then noticed it made a complete stop and shut off its light like it didn't want to be seen. the object backed away from the airport in the same path it came in. once it got a little distance from the airport it's lights came back on. i ran thru my complex to be able to watch it leave the area. the object moved a few miles from the airport and stopped again and hovered. then descended straight below the tree line. i watched and waited for the possibility of it raising again witch it did. it raised and descended again. security from my complex also witnessed the event. i was excited that i finally got to see such an incredible event because i have always herd of people saying they saw ufos. i don't go on belief believing is the same as saying guessing. i saw something that was incredible.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo passed ove my apt complex headed toward macarthur airport   object came to a complete stop turned off lights and backed away from the area in the same line it traveled.  object made another complete stop hovered then descended below tree line have vid

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside with another person and a dog. the other person and the dog walked over and  stood next to and under a tree and i was stationary away from the tree with nothing next to or above me.

i was just standing there and i looked up to see a low flying large round bright light glowing blue-white sphere object. large in size bigger than a helicopter and low above the street and trees. it made no noise.

it stopped for a moment over me and i quickly yelled out and pointed at it "what the heck is that! (it stops and hovers for a moment) what the heck is that!" it then takes off again so fast it seemed to just disappear!  the other person moved to try in see it, but it was gone already. 

however, there seemed to be an instant magnetic charge in the air as the other person's metal zipper on their sweater (he was the only one of us wearing anything with metal on it) suddenly felt tugged on. 

we search the sky with our eyes now, but see nothing. a few minutes has gone by and a dark helicopter came flying in and around the area where i last saw the ufo. there was also a plane that was way up in the sky that then flew by in the n.E. direction that seemed unrelated.
content.summary: Bright light blue sphere fly hover then fly again

content.detailedDescription: This is about the 5th time i have seen these lights all from different areas, this time i decided to take photos with my cell phone. i was driving and happen to notice in the sky of the small orange-red lights so i pulled into a parking lot of the school where they were going to be moving over. there were 3 in a row, they move slow with no sound and then it appears that this ball of light is starting to fizzle out and then they completely disappear. the other occasions i saw them around dusk and that time 6 travel in a line one behind each other as they always do. they do not fly high, maybe about 300 feet in the air. i have never seen only 1 of these lights, there is at least 2 or more every time i have seen them. about a year and a half ago is the first time i saw them, there were 3 of them i noticed moving over the delaware river towards the trenton makes word takes bridge. my mother pulled over as soon as we got off the bridge into morrisville and i couldn't help but watch, as they were getting closer towards the bridge, they made a left turn and floated over trenton and disappeared right before my eyes over the city. the bridge is not a high bridge so if they would have continued in the direction of the bridge they would have hit it.  if you have questions please feel free to contact me.
content.summary: 3 orange orange-red balls of light that always travel behind each other and then disappear. .

content.detailedDescription:
Before i recount this first, let me preface this by saying i see these orbs all the time, a minimum of once a month, to up to several times per month. i'm a smoker and have dogs, so i go outside every night with. the reason i'm taking the time to report this instance is the how many there were in such short period of time and their flight paths. 

at 11:20 pm (it is 12:13 am, right now), i went out onto the deck to have a smoke and let the dogs outside. the house faces directly southwest with the stairs leading to it set 45 degrees off the corner, facing directly west. 
at night, i always take my binoculars out with me to look at the moon, jupiter, venus, etc...Which are 10x50 magnification with 5 degrees field-of-view. 

sitting on my steps, facing west, i saw an orb moving across the sky from the southwest, 20 degrees above the horizon. i tracked it with my binoculars up to the northwest and then lost in above the cloud cover. 

immediately after losing visual contact, i set the binoculars back to where it had come from and within approximately 1 minute saw another orb. this followed the exact same path through the sky, in the same amount of time.
again, i lost this in the clouds, and again resumed looking southwest. 

again, to my amazement (which i exclaimed audibly), a 3rd orb appeared traveling the exact same flight path. however, moments after seeing this object i saw a forth object directly behind the 3rd in very close distance. as close (if not closer) as the center star and one peripheral star of orion's belt. they both continued off to the northwest and again i lost them in the clouds.

the 4th and final object appeared, again in the same 20 degree southwest azimuth, but this object flew nearly directly over me. 
just before it would have been directly overhead (southwest > northeast track) it made a turn to the north and continued for a few seconds.
it then turned to the east and continued that way for a few seconds, and lastly turned to the northwest and disappeared in the same section of sky as the previous 4 orbs. 

they likened the apparent size and shape as a bright star but moved much more quickly than either a satellite or commercial aircraft. i actually made a comment internally, seeing a commercial aircraft bifurcate the first 4's flight paths from the east, that they should be able to see these things! i was also able to estimate that these spheres move at minimum, twice as fast as a commercial aircraft at cruise altitude and speed. 

i'll also note, although it may likely have zero correlation with these objects, there were flashes in the sky from a thunderstorm that had been moving this way from the southwest (it has since begun raining); this was the same part of the sky these objects appeared. 

just wanted it documented as i've never seen these things in this such an obviously coordinated manner.
content.summary: 8.3.15 - brewer, me: 5 orbs seen in eastern sky.

content.detailedDescription:
We are not really sure if it was april or may of 1982, but my friend and i left his farm in chatham, ohio traveling east on river styx road (a country road which parallels busy route 18). my friend knows the road names and distances better than i do and would be willing to tell you his memory of this event.

i think it was about 7 pm but could have been earlier. we had been picnicking all day at the farm. my sister and her husband had taken my daughter home with them and we stayed to clean up and were on our way to pick her up when we saw the ufo.

it was a clear night. we had the sun roof open and both noticed a real bright light in front of us, behind the only cloud in the sky. we were headed east and there was supposed to be a full moon (or near full) that night so right away we thought it was the moon rising from behind the cloud. then we looked a little to the right and there was the moon. so then we thought it was a plane's head lights as it was coming up but then we realized that it was hovering so we thought it was a spotlight from a helicopter. 

he had me turn off the car. it was perfectly silent,so we knew it was not a helicopter. he got out (i was driving, i stayed behind the wheel). he walked over to my window. as he stood there, the craft made a rapid movement to my left (north i guess). i mean, in a blink of an eye it was hovering above the trees. it looked like the size of a golf ball in the sky but my friend said it could have been a mile away so was probably very, very big.

i saw a silvery craft that looked like two saucers put together at the rims with a gap where the rims join to make room for a row of windows. there were white lights and red lights on the top and bottom of the craft. some were stationary and some lights were moving or blinking. 

my friend and i agree on most of the memory. this is the part he doesn't remember: i saw three "people" standing at the windows. they had big heads and long arms but it was not close enough to see detail like faces. 

then the craft - in a blink of an eye - zipped to the right and hovered for seconds or a minute then zipped back to where it was for seconds or a minute then zipped northeast in the blink of any eye and was gone.

when it was gone i think we said "did you see what i saw?" i don't know how long all this took. my guess is 10-15 minutes but when we got to my sister's i think she said we were 45 minutes "late". for several days we could hardly believe it happened, but seeing it together made it real.

this was my one and only ufo experience. i did not tell anyone for many years. in the mid-90's when i did tell some people i was ridiculed and realized it would adversely affect my credibility, so i hardly told anyone else till now.  i was watching a ufo show and there was a story about people who had an experience and did not tell till now because of ridicule. what spurred me on was that the show said maybe someone else saw something that night. 

this was not my friend's first experience. i think it was his third. he would be willing to tell you but he is in his 80's and does not use computer.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Friend and i saw light come from behind cloud. when craft came closer i saw entities in the window.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 11pm on friday, 7/31/15, i was at my house and i opened the front door to let my boyfriend in. immediately he began shouting for me to come outside, not thinking anything of it i stepped out the front door and looked up to where he was pointing. directly south of my doorstep about 20 miles away, i very clearly witnessed an object that at first i thought was a plane on fire, about to crash in our direction. it was descending incredibly fast, there was a bright orange-red glow to it that seemed to grow as it descended. it seemed as though the light being emitted was almost a plasma type substance - it truly looked as though it was on fire, but then it began to dim down and started to look more like an artificial light. about what looked to be a mile or two above the horizon, the object stopped descending and began to perform multiple directional changes including both back and forth from east to west and straight up and down. at this point i was relieved that it no longer appeared to be a plane crashing, but i was still terrified because i knew it was a ufo. from the door i leaned my head in and yelled for my parents, waking them up, they came outside and got to witness at least 15 - 20 seconds of the experience. once they were outside it was still moving in different directions, the lights then began lowering in intensity and the object started to ascend to the southeast. in 1 or 2 seconds it flew away and we didn't see any other activity for about an hour, then we gave up. 

total duration of sighting: 1 - 2 minutes
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ball of fire 20  miles south of bloomingdale descends, performs multiple directional changes, ascends southeast, disappears from vision in seconds

content.detailedDescription:
I had turned off the tv and was turning out the lights in preparation for going to bed at about 9:30 pm in my waterfront home of the time. passing a window i happened to glance out on a clear night and immediately noticed three unusually bright,iridescent orbs in motion. at first i thought they  were the port lights of passing fishing vessels but then realized they were travelling the wrong direction (from my left to right) which meant they could not be ship lights. all three orbs seemed to be performing what appeared to be orchestrated movements at times climbing in altitude and at others spiraling downward toward the ocean, definately interacting with each other. some of their movements were instant directional changes so severe as to 'boggle the mind. as i had served 5 years with the rcaf and later another 8 1/2 years with then tca (now air canada) i believe i have a fair idea of the capabilities of known military and civilian aircraft. the radical behavioral antics of these orbs far exceeded any intelligently operated aircraft of my knowledge. i continued watching them until a 'like-sized' white orb suddenly appeared and appeared to 'herd' the three reds into itself...Then all four simply disappeared in an instant. i stayed for a time staring out into the night but they never reappeared.
 
later that night i woke to use the bathroom and put more wood in the fireplace and when i bent to open the fireplace door i expereinced a heavy nose-bleed. something i don't ever remember having experienced either  before or since.

my feelings at the time of this event went from initial curiosity to increased excitement at the possibilities of what i was witnessing. at no time can i recollect having any fear or concerns of any kind.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 4 orbs (3 brillint red, 1 white) performing apparent orchestrated arial maneuvers while interacting with each other,after a period of time the 3 reds merged with the white and all disappeared from sight

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west at 6 am when i saw this light moving over the west mesa going north.  i stopped to really look at and then it just flew into a cloud and gone.  i'm a retired air force aircraft mech and i have seen all froms of aircraft. this was not an airplane. airplanes dont fly into clouds.  this is my 3rd time seeing ufos in my life
content.summary: Saw a light moving faster then a aircraft i have ever seen

content.detailedDescription: I entered out my back door clear sky a couple commercial aircraft flying in high altitude. notice orange glowing object come from the sw from house above tree line. it proceeded to travel east across sky and then appeared to travel se direction from east direction and gained altitude. i then noticed almost identical object same description come from same position in sw sky and follow same path. i then ran to bed room to ask my wife to look out her bedroom windows she noticed the same objects and they seemed to all follow the same path but kept a significant distance between each other. it was a definite formational flight path. but i witnessed no strobe  lights, or any noise from any of the craft. i felt they were going faster then a helicopter but slower then a aircraft. they all proceeded to fly off to the se gain altitude and fade away.
content.summary: At least 4 maybe 5 glowing object is same formational path
